title: Ukraine Peace Talks Remain Distant Even as Moscow Signals a Retreat
description: President Biden and European leaders say they cannot push Ukraine and Russia into negotiations, though some U.S. lawmakers are questioning aid for an open-ended war.
dc:creator: Michael Crowley, Edward Wong and Julian E. Barnes
media:credit: Finbarr O'Reilly for The New York Times
media:description: Ukrainian soldiers ride atop an armored vehicle. President Biden and European leaders are hard-pressed to describe a plausible endgame to the conflict that would be acceptable to both sides.
